MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CW8 postcode area of Weaverham, affecting properties in Owley Wood Road and surrounding area. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the repairs required to an underground cable fault and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3:00AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:48PM on 31st March 2021.
